## What's Changed

* Fix docc archive bugs by @AttilaTheFun in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2595
* Add `destination_timeout` attribute to `ios_xctestrun_runner` by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2577
* Adjust and add `apple_precompiled_resource_bundle` tests by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2593

## New Contributors
* @AttilaTheFun made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2595

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.12.0...3.13.0

This release is compatible with Bazel 6.x LTS, 7.x LTS, and 8.x rolling releases.

## MODULE.bazel Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_apple", version = "3.13.0", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_apple")
```

## Workspace Snippet

```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_apple",
    sha256 = "b892911288715b354e05b9a6fe9009635f7155991f24f27e779fe80d435c92bc",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/releases/download/3.13.0/rules_apple.3.13.0.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_rules_dependencies",
)

apple_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_swift//swift:repositories.bzl",
    "swift_rules_dependencies",
)

swift_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_swift//swift:extras.bzl",
    "swift_rules_extra_dependencies",
)

swift_rules_extra_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_apple_support//lib:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_support_dependencies",
)

apple_support_dependencies()
```

## What's Changed

* Add proper support for **rules_swift** `mixed_language_library` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2580
* Stop using rule(output_to_genfiles = True) by @EdSchouten in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2586
* Fix `ios_xctestrun_runner` not updating binary on delta updates by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2590
* Fix nesting of bundles with `apple_precompiled_resource_bundle` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2588
* Fix nested resources (e.g. `.momd` directories) with `apple_precompiled_resource_bundle` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2592
* Always process `Info.plist` files with `apple_precompiled_resource_bundle` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2591
* Expose a new `AppleDeviceTestRunnerInfo` provider from device-based test runners by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2581

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.11.2...3.12.0

This release is compatible with Bazel 6.x LTS, 7.x LTS, and 8.x rolling releases.

## What's Changed

* Fix apple_static_xcframework rule to exclude bundles of dependencies marked as avoid_deps by @sewerynplazuk in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2541
* Add `apple_precompiled_resource_bundle` by @maxwellE in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2504
* Allow to opt-out from library evolution by @sewerynplazuk in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2484
* Support Linux with `dossier_codesigning_reader.py` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2539
* Remove j2objc_dead_code_pruner from rules_apple by @erikkerber in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2552
* Fix processing of `infoplists` in `apple_precompiled_resource_bundle` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2565
* Fix `apple_precompiled_resource_bundle` to process all types by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2567

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.9.2...3.10.0

This release is compatible with Bazel 6.x LTS, 7.x LTS, and 8.x rolling releases.

## What's Changed

* Do not bundle .abi.json files by @vakhidbetrakhmadov in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2513
* Make cc_info_dylibs_partial handle only .dylib files. (#2516) by @hiroyuki-komatsu in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2517
* Only insert libXCTestBundleInject.dylib for unit tests by @andre-alves in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2530
* Use devicectl to install and launch *_application targets on a physical device by @CognitiveDisson in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2527
* Use `openssl` outside of Linux in `local_provisioning_profile_finder.py` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2522
* Fix `_fallback_srcs` check by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2521

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.8.0...3.9.0

This release is compatible with Bazel 6.x LTS, 7.x LTS, and 8.x rolling releases.

## What's Changed

* Add use_runfiles aspect_hint to include runfiles for specific cc_libr… by @gkoreman in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2479
* Fix bad docc argument for multiple symbol graphs by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2511

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.7.0...3.8.0

## What's Changed

* Update header style in release notes template by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2481
* Fix ios_xctestrun_runner with Xcode 16 by @andre-alves in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2469
* Correct incorrect skylib import in test runner tests by @mattrobmattrob in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2482
* Fix make var tests in ios_xctestrun_runner_unit_test by @andre-alves in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2483
* Update to rules_swift 2.0.0 by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2486
* Remove BCR fixed releaser config by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2489
* Re-add fixed releaser by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2491
* Fix app intents with Xcode 15.3+ by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2418
* Use `assertEqual` instead of `assertEquals` by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2493
* Update DocC for rules_swift 2.1.0 by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2487
* Upgrade to Xcode 15.4 from 15.2 by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2494
* Upgrade rules_swift to latest 2.x version by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2492
* Skip `ios_test_runner_ui_test` which is failing in CI by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2496
* Increase `ios_coverage_test` size to `large` by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2498
* Remove explicit repo name loading local bzl files by @erikkerber in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2485
* Sort load statements per buildifier 6.4.0 by @erikkerber in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2499
* Use buildifier 6.4.0 for improved load sorting by @erikkerber in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2500


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/compare/3.6.0...3.7.0


This release is compatible with Bazel 6.x LTS, 7.x LTS, and 8.x rolling releases.

## What's Changed

### Breaking Changes

- "Make" variables are now expanded inside of values in the `env` dictionary on test rules: #2476
  - If you previously used `env` like this: `env = ["$SOME_OTHER_VAR"]` you will now need to use `env = ["$$SOME_OTHER_VAR"]`   

### Other Changes

* Added support for the `--hosting-base-path` argument to `docc_archive`: #2455
* Added support for bundling dylib deps from `CcInfo`: #2473
* Added support for both pre-2.0 and post-2.0 **rules_swift** when using Blzmod: #2480
* Changed `.xctestrun` key `BAZEL_TEST_PRODUCT_MODULE_NAME`: #2454
* Updated `docc_archive` to support `deps` and `data`: #2450
* You can now nest `.app` bundles when using tree artifacts: #2449
* Fixed broken URL for platforms repo version 0.0.9: #2452
* Fixed provider type checking for `AppleDynamicFrameworkProvider` migration: #2453

This release is compatible with Bazel 6.x LTS, 7.x LTS, and 8.x rolling releases.

* Avoid the deprecated --product_type argument for actool actions, use the new arguments for the sticker icons for messages extensions. by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2316
* [Docs] Refresh iOS tutorial by @BalestraPatrick in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2314
* Fix unbound variable when printing an `archive_contents_test` failure message by @jszumski in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2319
* Remove Samuel from OWNERS by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2321
* Include dSYMs for any bundled extension targets in the app's xcarchive by @jszumski in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2320
* Fix dSYM generation for extensions containing spaces in `bundle_name` by @jszumski in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2323

* Add support to run `visionos_application` in simulator via `bazel run` by @BalestraPatrick in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2327

* Add swiftinterface_imports to apple_static_xcframework_import by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2328
* Support extensions within single-target watchOS apps by @markvasiv in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2309
* Downgrade last_green to avoid failure by @BalestraPatrick in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2332
* Update rules_xcodeproj version on ios-app.md by @herlianzhang in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2333
* Cherry-pick visionOS changes for Xcode 15.1 and more by @BalestraPatrick in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2331
* Removing --experimental_strict_conflict_checks flag by @sgowroji in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2336
* Pass launch arguments to simctl launch command by @BalestraPatrick in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2338
* Fix the test_file location for UITests by @codeman9 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2349
* Fix minor issues with module_map rule by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2350
* Add support for clang modules in experimental_mixed_language_library by @luispadron in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2351

* Added swift_module param in partials to use it in xibs, storyboards and datamodels compilation by @tymurmustafaiev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2335
* Fix deprecation warning in `imported_dynamic_framework_processor.py` by @jszumski in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2334
* Add support for --attachment_lifetime in ios_xctestrun_runner by @kapoorlakshya in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2347
* Fix compatibility with --incompatible_objc_provider_remove_linking_info by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2356
* Update bazel version support table by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2358

## What's Changed

* Updated apple_support by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2260 and https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2293
* Made appintentsmetadataprocessor error with no output by @keith in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2262

* We now correctly add `.swiftinterface` files to imported dynamic xcframework `public_hdrs` by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2266
* We now filter out spurious "note:" messages from `momc` under Xcode 15 by @jszumski in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2276

* Propagate linkmaps into `xcarchives` by @maxwellE in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2282
* Set Python-specific environment variables in xctoolrunner to avoid UTF-8 encoding issues in actions that can return Unicode characters actool and ibtool when the user's environment for Python is not configured for UTF-8 by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2287
* Fixed codesigningtool to work with openssl 3 by @Jichao in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/2285

## What's Changed

- Use platforms inside Apple rules transitions (overridable with flags), removing the need for platform_mappings with bazel 7.x+
- Bump xctestrunner for Xcode 15 compatibility
- Make AppIntentsMetadataProcessor fail if it outputs errors

**Below are the changes that were also in previous release candidates.**

## What's Changed

- Add initial support for Apple `.doccarchive` through a new `docc_archive` rule, thanks @luispadron! See [the docs](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/blob/589671489e8fcbdec2803150a121d7f3f98b26e8/doc/rules-docc.md#docc_archive) for an example
- Add initial *beta* visionOS support. There may be breaking changes as Xcode changes before the initial release
- Fix issue where iOS CPUs defaulted to x86_64 instead of the current host arch
- Fix case where xcodebuild was always being used for logic tests, thanks @erikkerber!
- Fix some cases for upcoming `--incompatible_enable_cc_toolchain_resolution` flip, thanks @comius!
- Fix `ios_xctestrun_runner` failing when using parallel testing with a false positive saying no tests ran, thanks @kapoorlakshya!
- Ignore more variants of noisy codesigning output
- Assume target environment is device to ease transition to required platforms that aren't defaulting to using the `device` constraint
- Silence output from appintentsmetadataprocessor

## Potentially breaking changes

- A `platform_mappings` file is now required in some cases (e.g. if you are on a Bazel version older than [7.0.0-pre.20230823.4](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/tag/7.0.0-pre.20230823.4)). If you do not already have one you can copy [rules_apple's](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/blob/master/platform_mappings)
- Test targets now require `minimum_os_version` (#2124)
- Adds target name to bundle output paths when `bundle_name` differs from `name`. This allows having targets with the same `bundle_name` in the same `BUILD` file, thanks @chiragramani!
- Replaced `apple_common.multi_arch_split` with new transition, this should not be a breaking change but is required for bazel 7.x support. Please file any issues you find!
- Removes any support for Xcode prior to 14 from the rules, matching the supported versions from the App Store
- Imported versioned (macOS) frameworks need to be the correct format (https://developer.apple.com/documentation/bundleresources/placing_content_in_a_bundle), and currently don't support `--@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple/build_settings:use_tree_artifacts_outputs`/`--define=apple.experimental.tree_artifact_outputs=1`

## Notable additions

- Add support for app intents through the `app_intents` attribute
- Add ExtensionKit support to `ios_extension`, `macos_extension`, and `tvos_extension` rules
- Add rpaths to `apple_xcframework` generated binaries
- Add support for watchOS single target applications, thanks @BalestraPatrick!
- Adding Support for UI Test Coverage, thanks @gabijarciskeviciute and @mattrobmattrob!

## Notable improvements

- Include `private_deps` when gathering resources for Apple rules
- Include Apple Symbols for watchOS extensions, thanks @BalestraPatrick!
- Document Xcode version selection and invalidation strategy, thanks @BalestraPatrick!
- Improve exception message catching when running tests, thanks @sebastianv1!
- Embed frameworks in `ios_message_extension`, thanks @brentleyjones!

## Migrations

- `--@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple/build_settings:use_tree_artifacts_outputs` should be used instead of `--define=apple.experimental.tree_artifact_outputs=1`. Support for the define will be removed in the future.
- `--@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple/build_settings:signing_certificate_name` should be used instead of `--ios_signing_cert_name`

This release is compatible with 6.x LTS and bazel 7.x rolling releases

- Add initial *beta* visionOS support. There may be breaking changes as Xcode changes before the initial release
- Fix issue where iOS CPUs defaulted to x86_64 instead of the current host arch
- Fix case where xcodebuild was always being used for logic tests, thanks @erikkerber!
- Fix some cases for upcoming `--incompatible_enable_cc_toolchain_resolution` flip, thanks @comius!
- Fix `ios_xctestrun_runner` failing when using parallel testing with a false positive saying no tests ran, thanks @kapoorlakshya!
- Ignore more variants of noisy codesigning output
- Assume target environment is device to ease transition to required platforms that aren't defaulting to using the `device` constraint
- Silence output from appintentsmetadataprocessor

**Below are the changes that were also in previous release candidates.**

## Potentially breaking changes

- A `platform_mappings` file is now required in some cases. If you do not already have one you can copy [rules_apple's](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/blob/master/platform_mappings)
- Test targets now require `minimum_os_version` (#2124)
- Adds target name to bundle output paths when `bundle_name` differs from `name`. This allows having targets with the same `bundle_name` in the same `BUILD` file, thanks @chiragramani!
- Replaced `apple_common.multi_arch_split` with new transition, this should not be a breaking change but is required for bazel 7.x support. Please file any issues you find!
- Removes any support for Xcode prior to 14 from the rules, matching the supported versions from the App Store
- Imported versioned (macOS) frameworks need to be the correct format (https://developer.apple.com/documentation/bundleresources/placing_content_in_a_bundle), and currently don't support `--@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple/build_settings:use_tree_artifacts_outputs`/`--define=apple.experimental.tree_artifact_outputs=1`

## Notable additions

- Add support for app intents through the `app_intents` attribute
- Add ExtensionKit support to `ios_extension`, `macos_extension`, and `tvos_extension` rules
- Add rpaths to `apple_xcframework` generated binaries
- Add support for watchOS single target applications, thanks @BalestraPatrick!
- Adding Support for UI Test Coverage, thanks @gabijarciskeviciute and @mattrobmattrob!

## Notable improvements

- Include `private_deps` when gathering resources for Apple rules
- Include Apple Symbols for watchOS extensions, thanks @BalestraPatrick!
- Document Xcode version selection and invalidation strategy, thanks @BalestraPatrick!
- Improve exception message catching when running tests, thanks @sebastianv1!
- Embed frameworks in `ios_message_extension`, thanks @brentleyjones!

## Migrations

- `--@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple/build_settings:use_tree_artifacts_outputs` should be used instead of `--define=apple.experimental.tree_artifact_outputs=1`. Support for the define will be removed in the future.
- `--@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple/build_settings:signing_certificate_name` should be used instead of `--ios_signing_cert_name`

This release is compatible with 6.x LTS and bazel 7.x rolling releases

### MODULE.bazel Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_apple", version = "3.0.0-rc2", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_apple")
```

### Workspace Snippet

```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_apple",
    sha256 = "2c6ab2f5903a4487f2cf31ec3f2f3a71244ec159dd94c3fde339ee23193df791",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/releases/download/3.0.0-rc2/rules_apple.3.0.0-rc2.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_rules_dependencies",
)

apple_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_swift//swift:repositories.bzl",
    "swift_rules_dependencies",
)

swift_rules_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_rules_swift//swift:extras.bzl",
    "swift_rules_extra_dependencies",
)

swift_rules_extra_dependencies()

load(
    "@build_bazel_apple_support//lib:repositories.bzl",
    "apple_support_dependencies",
)

apple_support_dependencies()
```

- Replaced `apple_common.multi_arch_split` with new transition, this should not be a breaking change but is required for bazel 7.x support. Please file any issues you find!
- Removes any support for Xcode prior to 14 from the rules, matching the supported versions from the App Store
- Imported versioned (macOS) frameworks need to be the correct format (https://developer.apple.com/documentation/bundleresources/placing_content_in_a_bundle), and currently don't support `--@build_bazel_rules_apple//apple/build_settings:use_tree_artifacts_outputs`/`--define=apple.experimental.tree_artifact_outputs=1`

## Notable additions

- Add ExtensionKit support to `ios_extension`, `macos_extension`, and `tvos_extension` rules
- Add rpaths to `apple_xcframework` generated binaries

## Notable improvements

## Migrations

* Fixed `ios_x86_64_sim_reuse_disabled_runner` typo
* Added support for `--command_line_args` in `ios_xctestrun_runner`

This release is compatible with 6.x LTS and bazel 7.x rolling releases

- Fixed making Frameworks directory in device UI tests when it already exists, thanks @erikkerber!

## What's Changed

- Fix alternate icons support for single device-family apps
- Optimize dtrace, support objc_library compile
- Add support for apple.locales_to_exclude
- Only fail `ios_xctestrun_runner` when bundle executes nothing
- Support on device UI Testing in the new runner
- Rename generated `experimental_mixed_language_library` module map
- Fix UI testing with new runner in Xcode 15+
- Fix XCTestRun attachment lifetime in the new runner
- Fix Metal headers not included in `MetalCompile` actions
- Add `xcarchive` rule to generate Xcode archives
- Add `macos_framework` and `macos_static_framework` to support macOS

This release is compatible with 6.x LTS and bazel 7.x rolling releases

### MODULE.bazel Snippet

```bzl
bazel_dep(name = "rules_apple", version = "2.4.0", repo_name = "build_bazel_rules_apple")
```

### Workspace Snippet


## What's Changed

- Deprecate support for `runtime_deps` which have been removed from bazel. Use `data` instead.
- Add `testonly` support to `experimental_mixed_language_library`
- Remove support for bitcode now that Xcode 14.1 is the minimum supported version required for uploading to the App Store
- Fix UI tests with the new test runner and Xcode 14.3, thanks @maxwellE!
- Update xctestrunner to support Xcode 14.3
- Respect `--incompatible_objc_alwayslink_by_default`

This release is compatible with 6.x LTS and bazel 7.x rolling releasess

## What's Changed

- Added data attribute to `apple_static_{framework,xcframework}_import` rules (#1841)
- Added framework linking info to `CcInfo` of framework rules (#1845)
- Added linking info to `CcInfos` of `apple_framework_import` rules (#1847)
- Coverage manifest change is now applied to the new test runner (#1846)
- Deps no longer require the `ObjcProvider` provider (#1854)
- Reverted "Fix linkmap test on M1s (#1595)" (#1866)
- Added support for UI testing with `ios_xctestrun_runner` (#1852)
- Added support for simulator name input to `ios_xctestrun_runner` (#1874)
- Added custom xcodebuild args to `ios_xctestrun_runner` (#1876)
- Added `test_filter`/`--test_filter` support to `ios_xctestrun_runner` (#1878)
- [ios_xctestrun_runner] Force `xcodebuild` sometimes (#1882)
- Added `ios_xctestrun_runner` rule override attributes (#1884)
- clang_rt is now included independent of `asan`, `tsan`, and `ubsan` features (#1883)
- Added more entitlements validation (#1888)
- `TEST_UNDECLARED_OUTPUTS_DIR` is now passed to test processes (#1889)
- Fixed linking static frameworks with sdk requirements (#1892)
- Added `DEBUG_XCTESTRUNNER` var (#1890)
- Removed `implicit_outputs` from `apple_binary` (#1898)
- Fixed `clangrttool` if Xcode is installed in a non default location (#1905)
- Added dylib extension to dynamic libraries (#1897) 
- Renamed macOS xcresult bundle filename (#1920)
- `DefaultInfo.files_to_run` is now used for `resolved_tools` executables (#1923) 

This release is compatible with: 6.0.0

## What's Changed

- Reverted "Strip bitcode from stub binaries" (#1755)
- Hardened framework import Headers/ parsing (#1798)
- Added `xctestrun` based iOS unit test runner (#1612)
- Removed subpar dependency (#1746)
- Added Bzlmod module_extension for `provisioning_profile_repository` (#1808)
- Added override for `startup_timeout_sec` in tests (#1810)
- Add `experimental_mixed_language_library` macro to support building mixed Objective-C and Swift modules (#1812)
- Fixed test crash at launch on iOS 14 (#1822) 
- Upgraded xctestrunner to `24629f3e6c0dda397f14924b64eb45d04433c07e` (#1823)
- Updated apple_support to 1.4.1 (#1837)
- Upgrades rules_swift to 1.6.0 (#1839)

## What's Changed

- Add mnemonic to FindProvisioningProfile, thanks @erikkerber!
- Ignore skip_codesign_simulator_bundles for frameworks when building for device, thanks @BalestraPatrick!
- Allow for deps with only CcInfo on framework imports, thanks @dierksen!
- Update rules_swift
- Add validation for the proximity reader payment entitlement ([#1740](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/1740))
- Strip bitcode from stub binaries to fix errors during App Store Connect validation ([#1703](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/1703))
- Add resources support to apple_static_xcframework ([#1577](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/1577))
- Add sanitizer support for iOS tests ([#1590](https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_apple/pull/1590))
- The 2.x releases drop support for Bazel 5.x TLS. Use the 1.x releases for bazel 5.x

This release is compatible with: 6.0.0
